attributes.action: UNIVERSITY TO HOLD EXAMS ONLINE 2022 DUE TO DISTRUPTION IN LEARNING
attributes.additional_details: There is no lockdown and no online learning meaning if you get sick you miss out and won't do well revising or doing exams.
attributes.background: Hold summer examinations online for 2022 as many classes have been disrupted by absence due to covid. Everyone should have a fair chance of doing exams online.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual institutions.
